title: Enhances the reporting requirements for businesses, outside of a city with population of one million or more,  which store or use hazardous materials
summary: Enhances the reporting requirements for the storage or use of hazardous materials by businesses, outside of a city having a population of one million or more.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring businesses to notify the local firefighting agency of the presence of hazardous materials
